title: Drakin
summaries: The Drakin is an enemy in the Old One's Army event that requires 100 kills to be awarded with the corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills. It has a large amount of health and is immune to knockback making it a very strong and tough enemy. It attacks by firing a barrage of [img:Drakin Shot] Drakin Shot projectiles.

statistics.Banner: [img:Drakin Banner]Drakin Banner
